metadata.title: CVE-2011-4916 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Linux kernel through 3.1 allows local users to obtain sensitive keystrokeinformation via access to /dev/pts/ and /dev/tty*.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'upstream determined we have sufficient facilities already').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
